title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children node listing is not displayed.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement. 2. Open the data set editor and go to the data source page. 3. Change the data source to one that has no database/table/column information. 4. Observe that the children node listing is not displayed. 5. Close the data set editor and reopen it.
